verses.verse: ( God’s Name Is Great in Israel) לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> lam·naṣ·ṣê·aḥ For the choirmaster. בִּנְגִינֹ֑ת <WH5058> bin·ḡî·nōṯ With stringed instruments. מִזְמ֖וֹר <WH4210> miz·mō·wr A Psalm לְאָסָ֣ף <WH623> lə·’ā·sāp̄ of Asaph. שִֽׁיר׃ <WH7892> šîr A song. נוֹדָ֣ע <WH3045> nō·w·ḏā‘ is known בִּֽיהוּדָ֣ה <WH3063> bî·hū·ḏāh in Judah; אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm God בְּ֝יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> bə·yiś·rā·’êl in Israel. גָּד֥וֹל <WH1419> gā·ḏō·wl is great שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> šə·mōw His name

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> way·hî is בְשָׁלֵ֣ם <WH8004> ḇə·šā·lêm in Salem, ( That is, Jerusalem) סֻכּ֑וֹ <WH5520> suk·kōw His tent וּמְע֖וֹנָת֣וֹ <WH4585> ū·mə·‘ō·w·nā·ṯōw His dwelling place בְצִיּֽוֹן׃ <WH6726> ḇə·ṣî·yō·wn in Zion.

שָׁ֭מָּה <WH8033> māh There שִׁבַּ֣ר <WH7665> šib·bar He shattered רִשְׁפֵי־ <WH7565> riš·p̄ê- the flaming arrows קָ֑שֶׁת <WH7198> qā·šeṯ ..., מָגֵ֬ן <WH4043> mā·ḡên the shield וְחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> wə·ḥe·reḇ and sword וּמִלְחָמָ֣ה <WH4421> ū·mil·ḥā·māh and weapons of war. סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> se·lāh Selah

נָ֭אוֹר <WH215> nā·’ō·wr are resplendent with light, אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> ’at·tāh You אַדִּ֗יר <WH117> ’ad·dîr more majestic מֵֽהַרְרֵי־ <WH2042> mê·har·rê- than mountains טָֽרֶף׃ <WH2964> ṭā·rep̄ filled with game.

אֶשְׁתּוֹלְל֨וּ׀ <WH7997> ’eš·tō·wl·lū lie plundered; אַבִּ֣ירֵי <WH47> ’ab·bî·rê The valiant לֵ֭ב <WH3820> lêḇ ... נָמ֣וּ <WH5123> nā·mū they sleep שְׁנָתָ֑ם <WH8142> šə·nā·ṯām their last sleep. וְלֹא־ <WH3808> wə·lō- No מָצְא֖וּ <WH4672> mā·ṣə·’ū could lift כָל־ <WH3605> ḵāl ... אַנְשֵׁי־ <WH376> ’an·šê- men חַ֣יִל <WH2428> ḥa·yil of might יְדֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH3027> yə·ḏê·hem a hand.

מִ֭גַּעֲרָ֣תְךָ <WH1606> mig·ga·‘ă·rā·ṯə·ḵā At Your rebuke, אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hê O God יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> ya·‘ă·qōḇ of Jacob, נִ֝רְדָּ֗ם <WH7290> nir·dām lie stunned. וְרֶ֣כֶב <WH7393> wə·re·ḵeḇ and rider וָסֽוּס׃ <WH5483> wā·sūs both horse

אַתָּ֤ה׀ <WH859> ’at·tāh You נ֥וֹרָא <WH3372> nō·w·rā are to be feared. אַ֗תָּה <WH859> ’at·tāh alone וּמִֽי־ <WH4310> ū·mî- who יַעֲמֹ֥ד <WH5975> ya·‘ă·mōḏ can stand לְפָנֶ֗יךָ <WH6440> lə·p̄ā·ne·ḵā before You? מֵאָ֥ז <WH227> mê·’āz When אַפֶּֽךָ׃ <WH639> ’ap·pe·ḵā You are angry,

מִ֭שָּׁמַיִם <WH8064> miš·šā·ma·yim From heaven הִשְׁמַ֣עְתָּ <WH8085> hiš·ma‘·tā You pronounced דִּ֑ין <WH1779> dîn judgment, אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> ’e·reṣ [and] the earth יָֽרְאָ֣ה <WH3372> yā·rə·’āh feared וְשָׁקָֽטָה׃ <WH8252> wə·šā·qā·ṭāh and was still

בְּקוּם־ <WH6965> bə·qūm- rose up לַמִּשְׁפָּ֥ט <WH4941> lam·miš·pāṭ to judge, אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm when God לְהוֹשִׁ֖יעַ <WH3467> lə·hō·wō·šî·a‘ to save כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- all עַנְוֵי־ <WH6035> ‘an·wê- the lowly אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> ’e·reṣ of the earth. סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> se·lāh Selah

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- Even חֲמַ֣ת <WH2534> ḥă·maṯ the wrath אָדָ֣ם <WH120> ’ā·ḏām of man תּוֹדֶ֑ךָּ <WH3034> tō·w·ḏe·kā shall praise You; שְׁאֵרִ֖ית <WH7611> šə·’ê·rîṯ with the survivors חֵמֹ֣ת <WH2534> ḥê·mōṯ of wrath תַּחְגֹּֽר׃ <WH2296> taḥ·gōr You will clothe Yourself. ( Or Surely Your wrath against men brings You praise, and the survivors of Your wrath will be restrained.)

נִֽדֲר֣וּ <WH5087> ni·ḏă·rū Make וְשַׁלְּמוּ֮ <WH7999> wə·šal·lə·mū and fulfill your vows לַיהוָ֪ה <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD אֱ‍ֽלֹהֵ֫יכֶ֥ם <WH430> ’ĕlō·hê·ḵem your God; כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- let all סְבִיבָ֑יו <WH5439> sə·ḇî·ḇāw the neighboring lands יוֹבִ֥ילוּ <WH2986> yō·w·ḇî·lū bring שַׁ֝֗י <WH7862> šay tribute לַמּוֹרָֽא׃ <WH4172> lam·mō·w·rā to Him who is to be feared.

יִ֭בְצֹר <WH1219> yiḇ·ṣōr He breaks ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> rū·aḥ the spirits נְגִידִ֑ים <WH5057> nə·ḡî·ḏîm of princes; נ֝וֹרָ֗א <WH3372> nō·w·rā He is feared לְמַלְכֵי־ <WH4428> lə·mal·ḵê- by the kings אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ’ā·reṣ of the earth.
